thread.title: A First Look at the A-Cold-Wall x NikeLab Air Force 1
thread.title_full: A First Look at the A-Cold-Wall x NikeLab Air Force 1

author: Jesse Bernard
title: A First Look at the A-Cold-Wall x NikeLab Air Force 1
text:
In the latest of a carefully selected collaborators, NikeLab’s reveals its new project with A-Cold-Wall. Announced by A-Cold-Wall founder Samuel Ross via Instagram, the Air Force 1 combines a white and tonal gray aesthetic with the ACW logo placed on the tongue and upper sole.
Congrats, SAMUEL*. 
A photo posted by Sky Gellatly (@skygellatly) on Jan 6, 2017 at 2:13pm PST 

Not much is known about the shoe beyond the preview Ross shared however NikeLab’s previous collaborations with VLONE and ACRONYM indicate that this will be another popular release. A-Cold-Wall has been making waves in streetwear and high fashion since its launch in 2015.
You can watch the A-Cold-Wall London Fashion Week Men’s installation here , featuring pieces from their AW17 collection.

In other sneaker news, adidas unveils two new colorways of the Ultraboost Uncaged 2.0.
